name: Hunt for the Space Burritos
description:
My submission for the 'Stop Waiting For Godot' game jam. I had initially intended for this to be a space dungeon crawler, but I ran out of time due to mental health reasons. I repurposed it into a very short walking sim, complete with randomly generated inspirational quotes. Even though I didn't get to make what I wanted, this game jam did give me the opportunity to actually finish a project, in addition to learning how to do a few new things I previously didn't know about. Someday I will finish and release this game as I intended it to be.

WASD or arrow keys to move.

All 'art' is by me.
